Uses of Class
ca.concordia.risk.game.Card

Packages that use Card
Package Description
ca.concordia.risk.game  

  • Uses of Card in ca.concordia.risk.game

    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game that return Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Card Card.getAirliftCard()
    This method returns an AIRLIFT Card.
    static Card Card.getBlockadeCard()
    This method returns a BLOCKADE Card.
    static Card Card.getBombCard()
    This method returns a BOMB Card.
    static Card Card.getCardFromString​(java.lang.String p_cardString)
    Gets the card from its string representation.
    static Card Card.getDiplomacyCard()
    This method returns a DIPLOMACY Card.
    static Card Card.issueCard()
    This is a factory method that generates and returns a Card at random.
    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game that return types with arguments of type Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Collection<Card> Player.getCards()
    Gets the collection of cards the player currently possesses.
    Methods in ca.concordia.risk.game with parameters of type Card
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Player.addCard​(Card p_card)
    This method adds the card to the list of cards owned by the Player.
    boolean Player.useCard​(Card p_card)
    This method attempts to pick a specific type of Card from the list of Cards owned by the Player.
